headline: Does Lennox (LII) Dividend Policy Mask Deeper Questions on 2026 Demand and ROIC?
summary: Lennox International recently approved a quarterly cash dividend of US$1.30 per share, payable on January 15, 2026, to shareholders of record as of December 31, 2025. At the same time, concerns raised about residential HVAC cyclicality and the impact of the NSI Industries acquisition have sharpened focus on Lennox’s capital allocation and returns profile. We’ll now explore how questions about 2026 demand and return on invested capital could reshape Lennox’s existing investment...
